title: Why Is Imperial Tobacco Exiting Premium Cigars? - The After Show
itunes:title: Why Is Imperial Tobacco Exiting Premium Cigars? - The After Show
description:
This week on The After Show, we are looking at Imperial Tobacco. They sold off all their assets in the premium cigar business and their earnings went up. Is this good news for the cigar industry?

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at https://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
